sentences.en: A furious player kicked his racket into the grandstand.
sentences.cn: 一位愤怒的球员将他的球拍踢向了看台。

sentences.en: Ade was furious at heart.

sentences.cn: 同事们干着她的活儿，而她却在外面大吃大喝，这让大家都气坏了。

sentences.en: He has a furious temper.

sentences.cn: 听起来他是生气了, 甚至可以说是大发雷霆.

sentences.en: He was furious that we left without him.
sentences.cn: 我们扔下他就走了,他非常生气.

sentences.en: I am absolutely furious that he divorced me to marry her.
sentences.cn: 他为了娶她而和我离婚，我愤怒至极。

sentences.en: I was furious at his making such an accusation.
sentences.cn: 我对他的这种责备非常气愤.

sentences.en: I was inwardly furious.

sentences.cn: 萨拉尽管表面上对所有相关的人依然和蔼可亲，内心却怒火中烧。

sentences.en: She was absolutely furious .

sentences.cn: 她被妹妹抢去风头，感到气愤不已。

sentences.en: The action is fast and furious .

sentences.cn: 关于这些提议的争论非常激烈。
